laboratory_examinations.findings: 3+ (5-10 per 1000X FIELD): POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.

Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits; hyperechoic lesion compatible with known hemangioma; mild intrahepatic biliary dilation; gallbladder markedly distended with sludge and stones; gallbladder wall slightly thickened.
